item.title: How i can make edge bank to safe zone?
item.dc:creator: @kiev kiev
item.description:
@kiev wrote:

[quote=“I Metal I, post:2, topic:94595”]go from the south western most cornor of the area you want to make a safe zone then get the coords add them in the x and y posittions… then go to the north eastern most cornor and get the coords then put them in the correct position heres a tut on it made by a good freind of mine

Purpose: to make safe zones where ever you want

Difficulty: 1/10

Assumed Knowledge: How to get coords and type

Server Base: Pimp/Phone

Classes Modified: Client.java

Step 1: Ok to start off open your client.java and search for
public boolean nonWild() [not sure about spelling]

You should see this (or somthing similer)

public boolean nonWild() { if((absX >= 3016 && absX <= 3061 && absY >= 3647 && absY <=3725 ) || (absX >= 2668 && absX <= 2683 && absY >= 3414 && absY <= 3429) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3260 && absY >=3435 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3253 && absY >=3431 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 ) ||(absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 )|| heightLevel == 1) return true; else return false; }

Step 2: Get the coords for the safe zones by starting at the south west cornor of the area you want to be made safe, and then you want to head strait to the north east cornor of the are you want to be made safe and get the coords there then you want to put the coords in the nonwild boolean and you want to add it like this

||(absX >=XXXX && absX <=XXXX && absY >=YYYY  && absY <=YYYY )|| 
           ^              ^                 ^                 ^
    south west      north east        south west      north east
        cornor              cornor            cornor            cornor

Step 3:

Credits: n0vamage

Anti Leech: yes[/quote]

shouldnt the:

the coords then put them in the correct position heres a tut on it made by a good freind of mine

Purpose: to make safe zones where ever you want

Difficulty: 1/10

Assumed Knowledge: How to get coords and type

Server Base: Pimp/Phone

Classes Modified: Client.java

Step 1: Ok to start off open your client.java and search for
public boolean nonWild() [not sure about spelling]

You should see this (or somthing similer)

public boolean nonWild() { if((absX >= 3016 && absX <= 3061 && absY >= 3647 && absY <=3725 ) || (absX >= 2668 && absX <= 2683 && absY >= 3414 && absY <= 3429) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3260 && absY >=3435 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3253 && absY >=3431 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 ) ||(absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 )|| heightLevel == 1) return true; else return false; }

Step 2: Get the coords for the safe zones by starting at the south west cornor of the area you want to be made safe, and then you want to head strait to the north east cornor of the are you want to be made safe and get the coords there then you want to put the coords in the nonwild boolean and you want to add it like this

||(absX >=XXXX && absX <=XXXX && absY >=YYYY  && absY <=YYYY )|| 
           ^              ^                 ^                 ^
    south west      north east        south west      north east
        cornor              cornor            cornor            cornor

be like:

the coords then put them in the correct position heres a tut on it made by a good freind of mine

Purpose: to make safe zones where ever you want

Difficulty: 1/10

Assumed Knowledge: How to get coords and type

Server Base: Pimp/Phone

Classes Modified: Client.java

Step 1: Ok to start off open your client.java and search for
public boolean nonWild() [not sure about spelling]

You should see this (or somthing similer)

public boolean nonWild() { if((absX >= 3016 && absX <= 3061 && absY >= 3647 && absY <=3725 ) || (absX >= 2668 && absX <= 2683 && absY >= 3414 && absY <= 3429) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3260 && absY >=3435 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3253 && absY >=3431 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 ) ||(absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 )|| heightLevel == 1) return true; else return false; }

Step 2: Get the coords for the safe zones by starting at the south west cornor of the area you want to be made safe, and then you want to head strait to the north east cornor of the are you want to be made safe and get the coords there then you want to put the coords in the nonwild boolean and you want to add it like this

||(absX >=XXXX && absX <=XXXX && absY >=YYYY  && absY <=YYYY )|| 
           ^              ^                 ^                 ^

        cornor              cornor            cornor            cornor

public boolean nonWild() [not sure about spelling]

You should see this (or somthing similer)

public boolean nonWild() { if((absX >= 3016 && absX <= 3061 && absY >= 3647 && absY <=3725 ) || (absX >= 2668 && absX <= 2683 && absY >= 3414 && absY <= 3429) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3260 && absY >=3435 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3253 && absY >=3431 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 ) ||(absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 )|| heightLevel == 1) return true; else return false; }

Step 2: Get the coords for the safe zones by starting at the south west cornor of the area you want to be made safe, and then you want to head strait to the north east cornor of the are you want to be made safe and get the coords there then you want to put the coords in the nonwild boolean and you want to add it like this

||(absX >=XXXX && absX <=XXXX && absY >=YYYY  && absY <=YYYY )||
